name: 陳儀
objective: This course is designed for international students with basic Chinese proficiency, aiming to further enhance their overall listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. It helps students communicate more confidently and fluently in increasingly complex daily interactions. The course focuses on expanding vocabulary, strengthening sentence structure usage, and improving language comprehension and expression through reading and writing practice. Additionally, aspects of Chinese culture will be integrated to deepen students' understanding and appreciation, broadening and enriching their language learning experience.
